body:
Hello, I am proud to present my new Pvp montage on Avicus. If you can, please like, comment and subscribe (It really means something to me if you do), anyway, I hope you enjoy it,
Thanks for taking the time to watch it,
Lego :)

VIDEO: http://youtu.be/JTOZjl5MEIg

(As usual, the link may not work for a bit)
